goal.ch:
針對各類型生物醫學影像進行原理與應用介紹
Introduction to the Principles and Applications of Various Types of Biomedical Imaging
與學生進行互動，課前分組準備課程簡報，課程中教師會進行講課與討論
Engage with students through interactive sessions, with groups preparing course presentations before class. During the class, the instructor will deliver lectures and lead discussions.
goal.en:
針對各類型生物醫學影像進行原理與應用介紹
Introduction to the Principles and Applications of Various Types of Biomedical Imaging
與學生進行互動，課前分組準備課程簡報，課程中教師會進行講課與討論
Engage with students through interactive sessions, with groups preparing course presentations before class. During the class, the instructor will deliver lectures and lead discussions.

outline.ch:
1課程簡介與大綱說明 Introduction
2一般x光影像成像原理介紹Principle of x-ray
3電腦斷層影像成像原理介紹Principle computer tomography
4核磁共振影像成像原理介紹Principle of MRI
5核子醫學影像成像原理介紹—單光子造影Principle of SPECT image
6核子醫學影像成像原理介紹—正子造影Principle of PET image
7光學影像成像原理介紹Principle of Optical image
8超音波影像成像原理介紹Principle of Ultrasound
9期中報告Midterm report
10口腔癌相關分子影像的應用Molecular image on oral cancer
11腦部疾病相關分子影像的應用Molecular image on brain disease
12腦癌相關分子影像的應用Molecular image on brain tumor
13肝癌相關分子影像的應用Molecular image on hepatocellular carcinoma
14分子核磁共振影像應用Principle and application of molecular MRI
15磁振基因圖譜原理與應用Principle and application of radiogenomic
16免疫相關疾病分子影像的應用Molecular image on immune-related disease
17轉譯醫學影像Image application on Translational medicine
18期末報告Final report

textbook.ch: Sonography Principles and Instruments 9th Revised edition Nuclear Medicine: The Requisites 4th Revised edition Computed Tomography 3rd Edition Molecular Imaging: Principles and Practice

gradMethod.ch: 出席(30％) / 期中口頭報告(40％) / 期末紙本報告 (40％)
